en.name: Pablo Torres

projects.title: Business Website
projects.my_role: UX Design, Frontend Development, Backend Development, Full-Stack Integration
projects.description: A marketing website was developed for a company specializing in industrial ovens and bending machines. It includes a main menu, sector-specific product catalogs, and contact pages to streamline client interaction and product exploration.

projects.title: Android Registration App
projects.my_role: UX/UI Design, Mobile Development, Backend Integration, Security Implementation, Unit/Integration/UI Testing
projects.description: A community dining hall management app streamlined beneficiary registration, family attendance tracking, and issue reporting. It included QR code integration, real-time status updates (paid/donated portions), and administrative dashboards for dining hall oversight.

projects.title: Unity Educational Videogame
projects.my_role: Game Design, Programming, Asset Integration, QA Testing, Performance Optimization
projects.description: This educational Unity game blends programming challenges (multiple-choice questions, language selection) with competitive leaderboards to enhance coding skills through engaging gameplay. Built with Unity for core mechanics and integrated with PHP APIs/JSON for user authentication, stat tracking, and leaderboard updates, it ensures a seamless mix of interactivity and learning.

en.about_me: My name is Pablo David Torres Granados, and I am currently studying in the 8th semester of B.S. in Computer Science and Technology (ITC) at the Monterrey Institute of Technology and Higher Education. Since a young age, I have felt a deep passion for technology, coding, innovative system design, and creating amazing user experiences. Along my journey, I have participated in a variety of projects, including personal initiatives, academic endeavors, and work projects. These experiences have equipped me with a solid set of skills and knowledge, which I am excited to apply and further develop in a professional environment. My goal is to join a leading enterprise in the market, where I can continue learning daily and contribute with enthusiasm and dedication.
